```{r, include=FALSE}
# Installing Libraries 
#install.packages(c("tidyr", "dplyr", "knitr", "tidyverse", "yaml"))
library("tidyr")
library("yaml")
library("dplyr")
library("knitr")
library("tidyverse")
library("tinytex")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# Reading Data
mudcatsRaw <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bmswnson/Mudcats/main/Data/seasonStats_2022-05-26.csv")
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
# Adding Full Names
mudcatsRaw$fullName <- paste(mudcatsRaw$First, mudcatsRaw$Last, sep = " ")
```



```{r, include=FALSE}
# Subsetting Stats
offense <- mudcatsRaw %>% 
  select(Last, GP, PA, AB, H, X1B, X2B, X3B, HR, RBI,
         R, HBP, AVG, ROE, FC, OBP, SLG, OPS, PA.BB, 
         BB.K, C., K.L, SB, CS, SB.)
offenseSelect <- mudcatsRaw %>%
  select(fullName, Last, GP, GP, PA, AB, H, X1B, X2B, X3B, HR, RBI,
         R, HBP, AVG, SLG, OPS, OBP) %>% 
  rename("singles" = X1B, 
         "doubles" = X2B, 
         "triples" = X3B)
```



# Offensive

## Team Leaders

### Average
```{r}
offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(AVG, .9) < AVG) %>%
  select(fullName, AVG) %>%
  kable()
```

### OPS
```{r}
offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OPS, .9) < OPS) %>%
  select(fullName, OPS) %>%
  kable()
```

### OBP
```{r}
offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OBP, .9) < OBP) %>%
  select(fullName, OBP) %>%
  kable()
```
